title: Morning Sunlight Protocol
action: Get 10-15 minutes of bright sunlight within 30-60 minutes of waking
why: Triggers cortisol awakening response and sets circadian rhythm for better sleep
how: Step outside or sit by a bright window. Face east if possible. No sunglasses needed.

title: Cold Exposure Protocol
action: 11 minutes total cold exposure per week, spread across 2-4 sessions
why: Increases norepinephrine, dopamine, and builds resilience to stress
how: Cold shower, ice bath, or cold plunge. Start with 30-60 seconds, build up gradually.

title: Non-Sleep Deep Rest (NSDR)
action: Practice 10-30 minute NSDR session when feeling tired or stressed
why: Restores dopamine, reduces cortisol, and improves focus without caffeine
how: Use guided yoga nidra, body scan, or hypnosis audio. Lie down comfortably.

title: Zone 2 Cardio
action: 150-200 minutes per week of Zone 2 cardiovascular exercise
why: Improves mitochondrial function, fat oxidation, and cardiovascular health
how: Exercise at conversational pace - you should be able to speak in full sentences.
